channel.title: Comments on: Wawa Customer Satisfaction Survey

item.title: By: mywawavisit
item.dc:creator: mywawavisit
item.description: I love Wawa is the best convenient store because everything it’s easy to grab or make, quick service and staff is always reliable. I love it. Thanks Wawa.
item.content:encoded: I love Wawa is the best convenient store because everything it’s easy to grab or make, quick service and staff is always reliable. I love it. Thanks Wawa.
